message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this product at a discounted price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value of similar products. However, I'm not willing to meet you at $850000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $880000. This is still a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $870000. Can you consider this price?

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand you're still looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $885000, which is a bit closer to your offer. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than this. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to go back and forth a bit more. Can you consider $875000?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $890000, which is a bit closer to your offer. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than this. What do you think?
